webwork-tex.statement: An unevenly heated metal plate has temperature \(T(x,y)\) in degrees Celsius at a point \((x,y)\). If \(T(2,1) = 146\), \(T_x \, (2,1) = 9\), and \(T_y \, (2,1) = -13\), estimate the temperature at the point \((2.05,0.95)\). \leavevmode\\\relax \leavevmode\\\relax \(T(2.05,0.95) \approx\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{20ex}{\hrulefill}}. Please include {\bf \underline{units}} in your answer.
